properties.name: Ålesund lufthavn
properties.description: REDDIT: We were in Ålesund this summer. Visited Atlantic Sea Park,  Sunnmøre museum (open air museum with old houses), and a cozy water park Bybadet. Just hanging around the port and lighthouse is nice too. We also took the stairs to the top of the Aksla mountain.

properties.name: Tueneset
properties.description: REDDIT: If you would like to hike in mostly easy terrain, there is Tueneset - area around Atlantic Sea Park, a very nice place with beautiful nature and some old World War 2 bunkers.

properties.name: Lærdalsøyri
properties.description: REDDIT: Your final destination for the day should be near Lærdalsøyri, beautiful little town

properties.name: Hjellefossen
properties.description: REDDIT: You could also drive a bit further if you like to Øvre Årdal, to walk into a beautfil vallet called Utladalen. Go from Hjellefossen. also i would suggest going up to Øvre årdal (right north from Borgund, so you can walk from Hjellefossen into to the beautiful Utladalen, with also various signs with history on it

properties.name: Hotel Union Geiranger AS
properties.description: REDDIT: lso a stay at Hotel Union Geiranger was nice. Great buffet dinner and nice outdoor heated pool with the mountains with the scenery.

properties.name: 29 | 2 Aurland
properties.description: REDDIT: 29 | 2 Aurland is a great choice. We stayed in 2019 and it was definitely a highlight. Book dinner — it’s the high-end version of dinner with other backpackers from around the world. The food and who you meet is well worth the extra expense.
